title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, November 10, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1855 that Henry Wadsworth Longfellow published his poem "The Song of Hiawatha," which sold 30,000 copies in its first six months.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1855 that Henry Wadsworth Longfellow published his poem "The Song of Hiawatha," which sold 30,000 copies in its first six months.
